definition: owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)

sentences.english: Gillett and Hicks hired Barclays Capital to put out feelers internationally to find a buyer.
sentences.chinese: 吉列特和希克斯委托巴克莱帮助他们全球寻找买主。

sentences.english: We do not entertain buyer who do not pay in full!
sentences.chinese: 如果买主没付全款，本人有权不出货。

sentences.english: So then I wondered, who is the ad targeting, who is the buyer?
sentences.chinese: 接着我又想，这则广告的对象是什么人，买主是谁？

sentences.english: Also, industrial scrap that is trimmed by stampers and auctioned to buyers.
sentences.chinese: 同样，工业废料由压模产生，再销售给买主。

sentences.english: Parcel out a shipment to several buyers .
sentences.chinese: 把一批船货分发给几家买主。

sentences.english: The high standard of workmanship will appeal to the most discriminating buyer.
sentences.chinese: 能吸引最有鉴赏能力的买主。

sentences.english: Buyers require additional supply of wood oil.
sentences.chinese: 买主要求再供应些桐油。

sentences.english: As ths transaction involves a very large sum, buyers have to think twice before deciding.
sentences.chinese: 由于这笔交易金额很大，买主在决定前必须再三考虑。

sentences.english: Another buyer kept bidding up the price.
sentences.chinese: 另外一个买主继续哄抬价格。

sentences.english: Think of yourself as the potential buyer looking at your lakefront house for the very first time.
sentences.chinese: 把你自己当成你的潜力湖畔的房子寻找买主第一次。

sentences.english: The plainness of these houses discourages many prospective buyers.
sentences.chinese: 这些房子很难看，使许多潜在的买主望而却步。

sentences.english: Buyers cleared the day's cattle run at steady rates.
sentences.chinese: 买主以稳定的价格买光了这一天牵到集市来的牲口。

sentences.english: At auction the buyer bid and bought the wool for his mill.
sentences.chinese: 拍卖会上，买主竞价，为自己的工厂购置羊毛。

sentences.english: I strongly recommend going for primary if you can.
sentences.chinese: 如果可以的话，我强烈推荐你买主险。

sentences.english: Buyer is those people that are engaged in pilfer date technically.
sentences.chinese: 买主是那些专门从事盗号的人。

sentences.english: It is a crime to adulterate foods without informing the buyer.
sentences.chinese: 不告知买主就对食物掺杂是犯罪。

definition: asking price/to ask a price/to demand terms (in negotiations)
to sell/to offer for sale/to put on the market
